This is one of my favorite games of all time. Not only is the story extremely enjoyable and thoughtful, but the atmosphere alone in some of the test chambers is enough to give you the chills. You truly feel out of place in this huge science facility as the only human surrounded by artificial intelligence and robots. Besides that, the gameplay itself is really unique and has great physics. Also, I live for GLaDOS's constant passive-aggressiveness.

Me lo compré porque estaba en oferta y tenia buenas reseñas pero no me esperaba que me llegara a gustar tanto.
Es un juego de puzzles en que tendrás que resolver gracias a una pistola que genera portales de entrada y salida, a partir de aquí deberás de mover cubos, ponerlos en diferentes mecanismos, saltar entre portales, "esquivar disparos" y en definitiva ingeniartelas para poder abrir la puerta que te lleve al siguiente nivel.
Mientras lo haces habrá una voz que te irá hablando y guiando en los diferentes niveles y será esta voz, llamada GLaDOS, la que te mantendrá enganchado y queriendo pasar al siguiente nivel para ver que es lo que realmente está pasando en Aperture science.
La historia es buena, como contra le pondría que quizá es demasiado corto y algún nivel puede que se te atragante pero siempre puedes googlearlo.
En definitiva recomiendo Portal si te gustan los juegos de puzzles, inteligencias artificiales y si tu capacidad espacial es buena ( si no puedes llegar a frustrarte en ciertos niveles y dejar de jugarlo).

Portal was probably the first first-person game I ever played. I was probably around 6 or 7 when my brother first got the Orange Box for Xbox. I remember watching him playing each of the games. I was afraid of the combat that Half-Life 2 provided, and he couldn't even get TF2 to work online, but Portal was something else entirely. Everything about it - the aesthetic, the mechanics, GLaDOS's dry humor (much of which I would later realize went over my young head), everything. I begged my brother to let me play it. I remember picking up the controller, and.... sucking at it. I distinctly recall getting disoriented on Chamber 01, the constantly switching portals making my head spin in circles. When I said that this was the first first-person game I've played, I wasn't kidding. Even my brother got upset with me. 

I'd say that I eventually beat it, but... I didn't. The levels with turrets were too frightening for me to attempt (I'd hand the controller over to my brother each time), and even the rocket turret near the end was too scary for me. Don't even get me started on the final boss. Nowadays, whenever I get the urge, I can sit down and play through the entire game in a little over 40 minutes or so - the puzzles are no longer puzzling, and I've memorized every quote down to the word. But for me, Portal is no longer about that, but rather, reliving the memories of my childhood. Every time I listen to the final song, Still Alive, i get misty-eyed, and filled with nostalgia. I remember copying the lyrics onto a piece of paper by hand, taking it into my room, and singing it until I could sing it by memory. I remember Christmas one year, my parents made me a box crafted to look like the cake, and an orange jumpsuit they had made to look like Chell's. I think I must have worn that thing for ages before I finally ripped it, playing around with my brother. 

Portal and its sequel both hold a very special place in my heart, and I don't know if I'd be the same person I am without it, nor do I think that there is any game that will ever be quite like it. My interests have changed in recent years and I've become more interested in other games. Yet, after all this time, I will still proudly say that Portal is my favorite game, and I cannot recommend it enough.
The Cake Is A Lie

Эта игра просто, одна из лучших игр когда либо созданных Valve (Не считая 2 часть). Пусть её и можно пройти за пару часов,  
но те юмор и ирония действительно останутся в моём сердце навсегда. Что же, плюсы игры: 1) Как я и сказал самый главный плюс в игре это ирония и юмор. 2) Головоломки не заставляют мозг кипеть, и это безусловно плюс. Из минусов игры могу отметить: 1) Плохую озвучку (которую можно простить, 2007 год, чего вы хотите?), 2) Некоторое количество багов, которое можно простить по той же причине, 3) Небольшую продолжительность (которое можно простить по двум причинам: в 2007 году не было современного понятия "хорошей графики", эта игра была создана чуть ли не под старт компании. Думаю объяснил своё мнение. Игра 10/10. P. S. : Т.к. все минусы я мог простить: за  2007 год (компьютеры ещё далеко не мощные были), и баги (т. к.: я немного рукож*п). P. S.: Моё мнение как всегда субъективно. P. P. S.: Я пошёл есть котлетки с пюрееешкой. P. P. P. S.: Торррртик - это ложь!

Acayip eğlenceli bulmaca oyunu. Oyuna sakin kafayla girip kanser olma ihtimaliniz var. Eğer oyun çok sinirlendirirse ara verin sonra devam edin. Ben ara vermeden devam ettim ama mecburen Youtube'dan bakmak zorunda kaldım bir kaç yerde. Resmi olarak Türkçe dil desteği yok ama internette yaması var. Ben indirimden 1.85 TL'ye aldım. İndirimsiz fiyatı biraz pahalı gelebilir. 2. oyununu satın alıp hikayeye devam edebilir veya Co-Op şeklinde arkadaşınızla oynayabilirsiniz.
